dialogue: Dilbert, I want you to install the new firewall.
The firewall guy gets blamed for every problem.
People will say, "Everything worked until you changed the firewall."
There will be no rest for me. I will have to defend myself against a continuous barrage of accusations.
It's always the firewall! Everyone blames the stinkin' firewall!
I surrender to the inevitable! Villagers, grab your pitchforks and torches!
How did he get that way?
